title: player1001101001
author: player1001101001
content: Hey folks,Help me sell my first NFT artwork. First ever of the collection.Price starts - $300Escrow accepted.Sneakpeak - https://imgur.com/a/8aP4phRMany more to come.

comments.author: cloudfir3e
comments.body: is this original made by you?and is it a fix price?and is the price negotiable?

comments.author: player1001101001
comments.body: Quote from: cloudfir3e on November 19, 2022, 03:33:43 AMis this original made by you?and is it a fix price?and is the price negotiable?Yes it is originally made by me.Price slightly negotiable

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Several basic information are missing... it is an auction ("price start") ?have you already produced other works of art in the real world? are you also selling on the NFT market? Mintage? In which blockchain is running (polygon/ETH/Xdai?)Last but not least, how did you arrive at the valuation of 300 USD? Actually this image has just 2 visits (3 with mine)...

comments.author: player1001101001
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on November 19, 2022, 09:59:36 AMSeveral basic information are missing... it is an auction ("price start") ?have you already produced other works of art in the real world? are you also selling on the NFT market? Mintage? In which blockchain is running (polygon/ETH/Xdai?)Last but not least, how did you arrive at the valuation of 300 USD? Actually this image has just 2 visits (3 with mine)...Â  No it is not an auction.I sell my artworks in local galleries and am taking those online now. NFT's seem to be a great platform supporting such artworks so have started with my crazy artwork collection.I am not selling those on NFT marketplace as of now. I am selling those to direct customers interested in my collection.I am running those on polygon.$300 is not the exact valuation. I am hoping for the interested parties to quote their perspective of valuation.
